lyrics:
18 contributorsgospel medley lyricschorus
thank you lord hallelujah
youve been so good to me
thank you lord hallelujah
im grateful for my blessings

verse 1
im grateful for my struggles trials and tribulations ive been through
ive realized no one can love like you do

chorus
thank you lord hallelujah
i feel your presence near
thank you lord hallelujah
i wont hold back my tears

verse 2
i gave you my trust and you took me out of the dark rain
my lord i survived it i give you the praise

bridge
lord youve been so good
youve been so good to me
im so grateful for my blessings
giving you all the praise
lord youve been so good
youve been so good to me
im grateful for all of my blessings
giving you all the praise
you might also likeverse 3
jesus loves me oh yes he does
jesus loves me oh yes he does
jesus loves me oh yes he does
for the bible tells me so
so so oh
so my jesus loves me i know he does

outro
amen amen
amen amen
amen amen
amen amenembed
